channel.title: Large fan in Blast Pit
channel.description: Know that huge fan you turn on and when it reaches full speed the force it generates sends you up to the roof? Everytime I activate it, the game crashes(to desktop) just before the fan reaches full speed. I suppose I can no clip to the top and bypass running the fan all together, but that hurts my OCD Windows 7 - 64bit intel i7 2.8 8gb ram ddr3 1333 XFX 5850 hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_22T18_6_0C0.mdmp (112 KB)

item.title: Large fan in Blast Pit
item.dc:creator: mrberg
item.description:
Know that huge fan you turn on and when it reaches full speed the force it generates sends you up to the roof?

Everytime I activate it, the game crashes(to desktop) just before the fan reaches full speed. I suppose I can no clip to the top and bypass running the fan all together, but that hurts my OCD

Windows 7 - 64bit
intel i7 2.8
8gb ram ddr3 1333
XFX 5850
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_22T18_6_0C0.mdmp (112 KB)

Read full topic
